fileSamples.statement:
(a : reg) (rl : list reg) (IHrl : forall vl0 vl3 : list val,
Val.lessdef_list vl0 vl3 ->
regs_lessdef (init_regs vl0 rl) (init_regs vl3 rl)) (vl1 vl2 : list val) (H : Val.lessdef_list vl1 vl2) : regs_lessdef
  match vl1 with
  | nil => Regmap.init Vundef
  | v1 :: vs => (init_regs vs rl) # a <- v1
  end

  | nil => Regmap.init Vundef
  | v1 :: vs => (init_regs vs rl) # a <- v1
  end.

fileSamples.statement:
(bc : block_classification) (rs : regset) (ae : aenv) (ros : reg + ident) (f : fundef) (rs' : Regmap.t val) (GE : genv_match bc ge) (EM : ematch bc rs ae) (FF : find_function ge ros rs = Some f) (RLD : regs_lessdef rs rs') : exists cunit : program,
  find_function tge (transf_ros ae ros) rs' =
  Some (transf_fundef (romem_for cunit) f) /\ linkorder cunit prog.
fileSamples.conclusion:
exists cunit : program,
  find_function tge (transf_ros ae ros) rs' =
  Some (transf_fundef (romem_for cunit) f) /\ linkorder cunit prog
fileSamples.hypotheses: (bc : block_classification) (rs : regset) (ae : aenv) (ros : reg + ident) (f : fundef) (rs' : Regmap.t val) (GE : genv_match bc ge) (EM : ematch bc rs ae) (FF : find_function ge ros rs = Some f) (RLD : regs_lessdef rs rs')
fileSamples.proofString:
destruct ros; simpl in *.
generalize (EM r); fold (areg ae r); intro VM.
generalize (RLD r); intro LD.
assert (DEFAULT:    exists cunit,       find_function tge (inl _ r) rs' = Some (transf_fundef (romem_for cunit) f)    /\ linkorder cunit prog).
simpl.
inv LD.
apply functions_translated; auto.
rewrite <- H0 in FF; discriminate.
destruct (areg ae r); auto.
destruct p; auto.
predSpec Ptrofs.eq Ptrofs.eq_spec ofs Ptrofs.zero; intros; auto.
subst ofs.
exploit vmatch_ptr_gl; eauto.
intros LD'.
inv LD'; try discriminate.
rewrite H1 in FF.
unfold Genv.symbol_address in FF.
simpl.
rewrite symbols_preserved.
destruct (Genv.find_symbol ge id) as [b|]; try discriminate.
simpl in FF.
rewrite dec_eq_true in FF.
apply function_ptr_translated; auto.
rewrite <- H0 in FF; discriminate.
rewrite symbols_preserved.
destruct (Genv.find_symbol ge i) as [b|]; try discriminate.
apply function_ptr_translated; auto.

  match (fn_code f) ! pc with
  | Some (Inop s) => successor_rec n f ae s
  | Some (Icond cond args s1 s2) =>
      match resolve_branch (eval_static_condition cond (aregs ae args)) with
      | Some b => successor_rec n f ae (if b then s1 else s2)
      | None => pc
      end
  | _ => pc
  end.

destruct (resolve_branch (eval_static_condition c (aregs ae l))) as [b|] eqn:STATIC;  try apply match_pc_base.
eapply match_pc_cond; eauto.
intros b' DYNAMIC.
assert (b = b').
eapply resolve_branch_sound; eauto.
rewrite <- DYNAMIC.
apply eval_static_condition_sound with bc.
apply aregs_sound; auto.
subst b'.
apply IHn.

sound_state prog s1 /\ match_states i s1 s2 ->

  (Plus (semantics tprog) s2 t s2' \/

  sound_state prog s1' /\ match_states i' s1' s2'.

  (Plus (semantics tprog) s2 t s2' \/
   Star (semantics tprog) s2 t s2' /\ (i' < i)%nat) /\
  sound_state prog s1' /\ match_states i' s1' s2'
